Studies suggest that the protein produced from the PSMB8 gene may play a separate role in the maturation of fat cells (adipocytes), and a shortage of this protein may interfere with the normal development and function of these cells.",GHR,Nakajo-Nishimura syndrome
Is Nakajo-Nishimura syndrome inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal recessive pattern,
